api_list.api_description: Retrieve multiple quotes from Breaking Bad.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of quotes to retrieve.

api_list.api_description: Get multiple random quotes from Game of Thrones.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: Number of random quotes to return.

query: I have a favorite number. Please fetch that number of quotes each from Breaking Bad and Game of Thrones.
